settings.title: Jason's commuting epiphany
settings.content:
Our founder, Jason, had a realization while working in a high-rise office building and daily commuting was causing him significant stress and delays.
He was tired of being constantly late to work due to traffic jams and public transit issues.

settings.title: Jason and William's meeting
settings.content: When William and Jason met each other, William had been in the outdoor cycling industry for a decade. He is also a cycling enthusiast who shares the same vision for making commuting more convenient.

settings.title: The creation of the City scape Electric Cruiser Bike
settings.content: That's when they founded Heybike and set out to create their first bike: Cityscape Electric Cruiser Bike. This bike helped people commute more conveniently, but it didn't stop there: Cityscape gradually and seamlessly integrated cycling into everyone's lives.

settings.title: Expansion & Innovation
settings.content: From a small garage to an international store, we continue to innovate and grow our product line to bring you best riding experience. Now we have over 40 models of e-bikes, including mountain electric bikes, folding electric bikes, city electric bikes, cruiser e-bikes, fat tire e-bikes, and many more for you to choose from.

As technology progresses, we have all seen the rise of Personal Electric Vehicles (PEVs) and their impact on modern transportation. Just a couple of years ago, this tech was in its early adoption phase. Still, we find that electric transportation options are hard to get our hands on and come at premium prices.

HeyBike was driven to provide widely accessible and affordable electric transportation to people across the globe.

settings.title: Mission
settings.content: To pioneer e-bike innovation, transforming lives and unlocking new dimensions of freedom.

settings.title: Vision
settings.content: Empowering a sustainable future as the premier provider of green transportation solutions.

We’ll always advocate the use of ebikes, whether you choose one of our models or a product from a competitor. That’s because we’ve realized—and we hope you will, too—that along withsaving a lot of green(both for the environment and for your wallet), riding an ebike will bringsmiles to your faceand to those of future generations.
